----
text/plain
> source{char: "f", id: 0}

{"type":"Insert","index":1,"char":"o"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "o", id: 1}
> next{left: 0, right: 1}

{"type":"Insert","index":1,"char":"o"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "o", id: 2}
> next{left: 0, right: 2}
> next{left: 2, right: 1}
main{from: 0, to: 1}; {P1: 0, P2: 2, P3: 1}.
